programName: Enter the string from user using BufferedStreamReader
code: // Enter the string from user using BufferedStreamReader import java.io.BufferedReader; import java.io.IOException; import java.io.InputStreamReader; public class ReadStringExample { public static void main(String[] args) { InputStreamReader isr = new InputStreamReader(System.in); BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(isr); System.out.println("Enter a string:"); try { // Read a line of input String inputString = br.readLine(); // Display the entered string System.out.println("You entered: " + inputString); // Close the BufferedReader br.close(); } catch (IOException e) { e.printStackTrace(); } } }
output:

        You entered: Hello, World!

programName: Get all characters from the file and display on the screen
code: // import java.io.File; import java.io.FileNotFoundException; import java.util.Scanner; public class ReadFileExample { public static void main(String[] args) { // Replace "yourFileName.txt" with the actual name of your file String fileName = "yourFileName.txt"; try { File file = new File(fileName); Scanner scanner = new Scanner(file); // Read and display all characters from the file while (scanner.hasNext()) { String line = scanner.nextLine(); System.out.println(line); } // Close the scanner scanner.close(); } catch (FileNotFoundException e) { System.out.println("File not found: " + fileName); } } }
output:
Hello, this is line 1.
        And this is line 2.

programName: Get all characters from the file, count number of lines, words, characters and display on the screen
code: // Get all characters from the file, count number of lines, words, characters and display on the screen import java.io.File; import java.io.FileNotFoundException; import java.util.Scanner; public class FileStatisticsExample { public static void main(String[] args) { // Replace "yourFileName.txt" with the actual name of your file String fileName = "yourFileName.txt"; try { File file = new File(fileName); Scanner scanner = new Scanner(file); int lineCount = 0; int wordCount = 0; int charCount = 0; while (scanner.hasNextLine()) { String line = scanner.nextLine(); // Count lines lineCount++; // Count words String[] words = line.split("\s+"); wordCount += words.length; // Count characters charCount += line.length(); } // Close the scanner scanner.close(); // Display the counts System.out.println("Number of lines: " + lineCount); System.out.println("Number of words: " + wordCount); System.out.println("Number of characters: " + charCount); } catch (FileNotFoundException e) { System.out.println("File not found: " + fileName); } } }
output:
Number of lines: 2
        Number of words: 10
        Number of characters: 43
